reviews.review:
하프라이프의 명성에 걸맞는 확장팩.
동료들의 ai만 진짜 절망적.
Bu Oyun Normal Half-Life'dan Bile Daha İyi, Silah Türleri Ve Bölümleri Çok İyi, Tavsiye Ederim.

One of the best game, I've played, i'd go as far as calling it better than Half-Life, or at least i think so as i enjoyed it more than Half-Life.

What i feel like it's better than normal Half-Life is the addition of more weapons(especially the bio-weapons, which are the most interesting) which i like more than the normal weapons you get in Half-Life, new enemies which are stronger than the the enemies you get to see in normal Half-Life, new mechanics, like the rope's you can climb on and for one as myself who always loved to bunny hop around, it's somehow easier to time hop's in Opposing Force than normal Half-Life.
The soundtrack, is as good, as the original Half-Life, i dig both of them.

-A really good old school Half-Life game.
-Good story,decent gunplay.
-And its really cheap,so if you somehow end up not liking the game,you really arent loosing much

Also,sorry for my bad grammar and spelling.
it be gud
相比半条命剧情稍微少了点，值得一玩。

I honestly enjoyed this more then the base game. The variety of new and wack weapons Gearbox added were great, and the final boss wasn't as piss poor as Nihilanth. If you liked Half Life, this is a must have.
Loved the game!!

Pros:
- New weapons to play with that change the tactical decisions of each fight
- Level design was fun and made some sense
- Voice work (for the time) was great too
- Great final boss
- Overall fun and engaging campaign

cons:
- Game is really old by this point so if you can't stand ancient source games don't pick this up
- Some enemies are overused and way too annoying (looking at you laser shooting asshole alien)
- A little on the short side

Half-Life: Opposing Force (or OPFOR) unlike blueshift, is actually really good. Out of Half Life and it's expansions Opposing Force has by far been my favorite for the new mechanics and enemies that have been added. My main complaints are that the Xen Aliens essentially (or more correctly the tough ones. IE: alien grunts, and vorts) cease to exist past the early part of the game. When I started I expected to see alien grunts slugging it out with the shock troopers and such. Also the Massive difficulty spike due too shock troopers having close to double the health of alien grunts. Although this is mitagated by the Squad mechanics or the black ops most of the time. All in all an amazing game, and hopefully Shepards story continues some day.

하프라이프의 확장팩이라기엔 너무 부실했던 블루 쉬프트와는 다르게 군인 설정에 맞게 무기를 바꾸거나 새로 추가하고, 스토리라인을 넓혀서 새롭게 추가한 적들도 난이도를 적당히 높여줘서 좋았음

또한, 밀리터리 스타일의 분대 전투나 주변 사물을 이용해서 보스를 죽이는 것도 하프라이프 시리즈에 걸맞은 수준으로 짜여져서 전작에 비해 재밌게 플레이 할 수 있었음
